articles.title: Wisconsin COVID-19 recoveries surpass 400,000; deaths remain high - Fox11online.com
articles.description: MADISON (WLUK) -- Coronavirus cases continued their decline in Wisconsin on Thursday, following a weeks-long trend. On the state's most recent weekly dashboard, only three area counties were listed in the "critically high" category for virus activity. Locally…

articles.title: Maine residents will get a card along with COVID-19 shot - Press Herald
articles.description: The cards are intended to simplify the process of getting vaccinated for coronavirus after patients receive the first of 2 shots.
articles.content:
PORTLAND Maine residents will be issued cards to simplify the process of getting vaccinated for coronavirus after they receive the first shot.
